short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Vinocount inventory while browsing supplier's websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate with your Vinocount inventory while ordering items from supplier's online stores. Click on the extension icon to view the current quantity of items in your inventory. Items not found in your inventory can be added with the click of a button.
